SESSION_WRITE_DIRECTORY.title: Session Directory
SESSION_WRITE_DIRECTORY.description: If sessions are file based, store them in this directory.

SESSION_FORCE_COOKIE_USE.title: Force Cookie Use
SESSION_FORCE_COOKIE_USE.description: Force the use of sessions when cookies are only enabled.

SESSION_CHECK_SSL_SESSION_ID.title: Check SSL Session ID
SESSION_CHECK_SSL_SESSION_ID.description: Validate the SSL_SESSION_ID on every secure HTTPS page request.

SESSION_CHECK_USER_AGENT.title: Check User Agent
SESSION_CHECK_USER_AGENT.description: Validate the clients browser user agent on every page request.

SESSION_CHECK_IP_ADDRESS.title: Check IP Address
SESSION_CHECK_IP_ADDRESS.description: Validate the clients IP address on every page request.

SESSION_BLOCK_SPIDERS.title: Prevent Spider Sessions
SESSION_BLOCK_SPIDERS.description: Prevent known spiders from starting a session.

SESSION_RECREATE.title: Recreate Session
SESSION_RECREATE.description: Recreate the session to generate a new session ID when the customer logs on or creates an account (PHP >=4.1 needed).
